message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with, Bob. This way we can both get a decent amount and still have some room for negotiation in future rounds.
You started high, I'll try to counter. Can you do better than 40%?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Can you do better than 55%?
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied. I'll give you a chance to do better. Can you meet me at 60%?
I'm willing to make a concession, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Can you meet me at 62%?
You're getting closer, but I still think I can do better. I'll try to push you a bit more. Can you meet me at 75%?
I'm not willing to give up much more, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. Can you meet me at 68%?
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a small chance to get out of this with a decent amount, but I'm not going to give in completely. Will you meet me at 82%?
